title: Bem Hunter Sword
description:
There are countless alien beasts (BEMs) inhabiting the planets at the edge of the universe. Sword Lann is a "Bem Hunter" who captures Bems alive on comission. Sword is off to deep space again in pursuit of another dangerous BEM!

Episodic chapters published very sporadically from 1986-2015 (2 volumes total).

Cover images:
Volume 1.0: 1991: Morning KC by Kodensha.  Never completed.
Volume 1.1: 1996: Sukora by Scholar.  Paperback bunko.
Volume 1.2: 2002: KC Deluxe by Kodensha.  Never completed.
Volume 1.3: 2006:  Kodensha paperback bunko.
Volumes 1.4 & 2.4: 2015: KC Deluxe Afternoon by Kodensha.  Finally complete.
